channel.title: How do i change Xp Rate?
channel.description: Where do i change how much xp i get for attking my objects? Its going up really fast and im want it to go slower?

item.title: How do i change Xp Rate?
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Search for the case of your object. Should look like

case OBJECTIDNUMBER:

and you should see something like this

addSkillXP((#OFXPYOUWANT*playerLevel[3]), 3);

Change the 3 to the skill you want xp added to and the # of xp you gain to your desire.

Ugh, you beat me to it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change Xp Rate?

item.title: How do i change Xp Rate?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok u have to find the case for which thingy you wanna change liek for dummy find the case [the ID] and

addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); u see those change the 150 or 300 w/e guess
